<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// with -Wall, this will generate these warnings which should be ignored. So</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00694" /><CodeLine lineNumber="694"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (UTF16ToUTF8(ExpandBuffer.data(), ExpandBufferSize - 1, ResultDirectory))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00695" /><CodeLine lineNumber="695"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00696" /><CodeLine lineNumber="696"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00697" /><CodeLine lineNumber="697"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00698" /><CodeLine lineNumber="698"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00699" /><CodeLine lineNumber="699"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00700" /><CodeLine lineNumber="700"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Populate ResultType with a valid MINIDUMP&#95;TYPE based on the value of</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00701" /><CodeLine lineNumber="701"><Highlight kind="comment">/// &quot;DumpType&quot; for a given Windows Registry key.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00702" /><CodeLine lineNumber="702"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00703" /><CodeLine lineNumber="703"><Highlight kind="comment">/// According to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00704" /><CodeLine lineNumber="704"><Highlight kind="comment">/// https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/desktop/bb787181(v=vs.85).aspx</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00705" /><CodeLine lineNumber="705"><Highlight kind="comment">/// valid values for DumpType are:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00706" /><CodeLine lineNumber="706"><Highlight kind="comment">///   &#42; 0: Custom dump</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00707" /><CodeLine lineNumber="707"><Highlight kind="comment">///   &#42; 1: Mini dump</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00708" /><CodeLine lineNumber="708"><Highlight kind="comment">///   &#42; 2: Full dump</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00709" /><CodeLine lineNumber="709"><Highlight kind="comment">/// If &quot;Custom dump&quot; is specified then the &quot;CustomDumpFlags&quot; field is read</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00710" /><CodeLine lineNumber="710"><Highlight kind="comment">/// containing a bitwise combination of MINIDUMP&#95;TYPE values.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00711" /><CodeLine lineNumber="711"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00712" /><CodeLine lineNumber="712"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\returns true if a valid value for ResultType can be set, false otherwise.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00713" /><CodeLine lineNumber="713"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> GetDumpType(HKEY <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a98c6256d0644613c6b5b3e2ef06ef5ce">Key</a>, MINIDUMP&#95;TYPE &amp;ResultType) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00714" /><CodeLine lineNumber="714"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a98c6256d0644613c6b5b3e2ef06ef5ce">Key</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00715" /><CodeLine lineNumber="715"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00716" /><CodeLine lineNumber="716"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00717" /><CodeLine lineNumber="717"><Highlight kind="normal">  DWORD DumpType;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00718" /><CodeLine lineNumber="718"><Highlight kind="normal">  DWORD <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/typesize">TypeSize</a> = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">sizeof</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(DumpType);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00719" /><CodeLine lineNumber="719"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ERROR&#95;SUCCESS != ::RegGetValueW(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a98c6256d0644613c6b5b3e2ef06ef5ce">Key</a>, NULL, L</Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;DumpType&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, RRF&#95;RT&#95;REG&#95;DWORD,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00720" /><CodeLine lineNumber="720"><Highlight kind="normal">                                      NULL, &amp;DumpType, &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/typesize">TypeSize</a>))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00721" /><CodeLine lineNumber="721"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00722" /><CodeLine lineNumber="722"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00723" /><CodeLine lineNumber="723"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">switch</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (DumpType) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00724" /><CodeLine lineNumber="724"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 0: &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00725" /><CodeLine lineNumber="725"><Highlight kind="normal">    DWORD Flags = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00726" /><CodeLine lineNumber="726"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ERROR&#95;SUCCESS != ::RegGetValueW(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a98c6256d0644613c6b5b3e2ef06ef5ce">Key</a>, NULL, L</Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;CustomDumpFlags&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00727" /><CodeLine lineNumber="727"><Highlight kind="normal">                                        RRF&#95;RT&#95;REG&#95;DWORD, NULL, &amp;Flags,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00728" /><CodeLine lineNumber="728"><Highlight kind="normal">                                        &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/typesize">TypeSize</a>))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00729" /><CodeLine lineNumber="729"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00730" /><CodeLine lineNumber="730"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00731" /><CodeLine lineNumber="731"><Highlight kind="normal">    ResultType = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">MINIDUMP&#95;TYPE</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(Flags);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00732" /><CodeLine lineNumber="732"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00733" /><CodeLine lineNumber="733"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00734" /><CodeLine lineNumber="734"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 1:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00735" /><CodeLine lineNumber="735"><Highlight kind="normal">    ResultType = MiniDumpNormal;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00736" /><CodeLine lineNumber="736"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00737" /><CodeLine lineNumber="737"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 2:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00738" /><CodeLine lineNumber="738"><Highlight kind="normal">    ResultType = MiniDumpWithFullMemory;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00739" /><CodeLine lineNumber="739"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00740" /><CodeLine lineNumber="740"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">default</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00741" /><CodeLine lineNumber="741"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00742" /><CodeLine lineNumber="742"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00743" /><CodeLine lineNumber="743"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00744" /><CodeLine lineNumber="744"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00745" /><CodeLine lineNumber="745"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00746" /><CodeLine lineNumber="746"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Write a Windows dump file containing process information that can be</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00747" /><CodeLine lineNumber="747"><Highlight kind="comment">/// used for post-mortem debugging.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00748" /><CodeLine lineNumber="748"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00749" /><CodeLine lineNumber="749"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\returns zero error code if a mini dump created, actual error code</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00750" /><CodeLine lineNumber="750"><Highlight kind="comment">/// otherwise.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00751" /><CodeLine lineNumber="751"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::error&#95;code WINAPI</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00752" /><CodeLine lineNumber="752"><Highlight kind="normal">WriteWindowsDumpFile(PMINIDUMP&#95;EXCEPTION&#95;INFORMATION ExceptionInfo) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00755" /><CodeLine lineNumber="755"><Highlight kind="normal">    ~ScopedCriticalSection() &#123; LeaveCriticalSection(&amp;CriticalSection); &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00756" /><CodeLine lineNumber="756"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125; SCS;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00757" /><CodeLine lineNumber="757"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00758" /><CodeLine lineNumber="758"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">using namespace </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm">llvm</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00761" /><CodeLine lineNumber="761"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::string MainExecutableName = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/fs/#a057a733b2dfa2f0531ceb335cf3b1d03">fs::getMainExecutable</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00762" /><CodeLine lineNumber="762"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> ProgramName;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00764" /><CodeLine lineNumber="764"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (MainExecutableName.empty()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00765" /><CodeLine lineNumber="765"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If we can&#39;t get the executable filename,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00766" /><CodeLine lineNumber="766"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// things are in worse shape than we realize</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00768" /><CodeLine lineNumber="768"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af0799d74677708a87dee45acdd40bab2">mapWindowsError</a>(::GetLastError());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00769" /><CodeLine lineNumber="769"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00770" /><CodeLine lineNumber="770"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00771" /><CodeLine lineNumber="771"><Highlight kind="normal">  ProgramName = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/path/#aa56d25bb5127dd7a5831c25764f76cbe">path::filename</a>(MainExecutableName.c&#95;str());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00772" /><CodeLine lineNumber="772"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00773" /><CodeLine lineNumber="773"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The Windows Registry location as specified at</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00774" /><CodeLine lineNumber="774"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/desktop/bb787181%28v=vs.85%29.aspx</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00775" /><CodeLine lineNumber="775"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &quot;Collecting User-Mode Dumps&quot; that may optionally be set to collect crash</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00776" /><CodeLine lineNumber="776"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// dumps in a specified location.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00777" /><CodeLine lineNumber="777"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> LocalDumpsRegistryLocation =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00778" /><CodeLine lineNumber="778"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;SOFTWARE\\\\Microsoft\\\\Windows\\\\Windows Error Reporting\\\\LocalDumps&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00779" /><CodeLine lineNumber="779"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00780" /><CodeLine lineNumber="780"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The key pointing to the Registry location that may contain global crash</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00781" /><CodeLine lineNumber="781"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// dump settings.  This will be NULL if the location can not be found.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00782" /><CodeLine lineNumber="782"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa7c9d8e330782ebd53b959199a7c29db">ScopedRegHandle</a> DefaultLocalDumpsKey(FindWERKey(LocalDumpsRegistryLocation));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00783" /><CodeLine lineNumber="783"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00784" /><CodeLine lineNumber="784"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The key pointing to the Registry location that may contain</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00785" /><CodeLine lineNumber="785"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// application-specific crash dump settings.  This will be NULL if the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00786" /><CodeLine lineNumber="786"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// location can not be found.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00787" /><CodeLine lineNumber="787"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa7c9d8e330782ebd53b959199a7c29db">ScopedRegHandle</a> AppSpecificKey(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00788" /><CodeLine lineNumber="788"><Highlight kind="normal">      FindWERKey(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/twine">Twine</a>(LocalDumpsRegistryLocation) + </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;\\\\&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> + ProgramName));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00789" /><CodeLine lineNumber="789"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00790" /><CodeLine lineNumber="790"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Look to see if a dump type is specified in the registry; first with the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00791" /><CodeLine lineNumber="791"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// app-specific key and failing that with the global key.  If none are found</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00792" /><CodeLine lineNumber="792"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// default to a normal dump (GetDumpType will return false either if the key</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00793" /><CodeLine lineNumber="793"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// is NULL or if there is no valid DumpType value at its location).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00794" /><CodeLine lineNumber="794"><Highlight kind="normal">  MINIDUMP&#95;TYPE DumpType;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00795" /><CodeLine lineNumber="795"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!GetDumpType(AppSpecificKey, DumpType))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00796" /><CodeLine lineNumber="796"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!GetDumpType(DefaultLocalDumpsKey, DumpType))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00797" /><CodeLine lineNumber="797"><Highlight kind="normal">      DumpType = MiniDumpNormal;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00798" /><CodeLine lineNumber="798"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00799" /><CodeLine lineNumber="799"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Look to see if a dump location is specified on the command line.  If not,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00800" /><CodeLine lineNumber="800"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// look to see if a dump location is specified in the registry; first with the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00801" /><CodeLine lineNumber="801"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// app-specific key and failing that with the global key.  If none are found</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00802" /><CodeLine lineNumber="802"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// we&#39;ll just create the dump file in the default temporary file location</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00803" /><CodeLine lineNumber="803"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// (GetDumpFolder will return false either if the key is NULL or if there is</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00804" /><CodeLine lineNumber="804"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// no valid DumpFolder value at its location).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00805" /><CodeLine lineNumber="805"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ExplicitDumpDirectorySet = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00811" /><CodeLine lineNumber="811"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00812" /><CodeLine lineNumber="812"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> FD;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00822" /><CodeLine lineNumber="822"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (std::error&#95;code EC =</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00825" /><CodeLine lineNumber="825"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00826" /><CodeLine lineNumber="826"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Our support functions return a file descriptor but Windows wants a handle.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00827" /><CodeLine lineNumber="827"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1b31339301d33bf27bd0bdddeb289738">ScopedCommonHandle</a> FileHandle(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">reinterpret&#95;cast&lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">HANDLE</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(&#95;get&#95;osfhandle(FD)));</Highlight></CodeLine>
